common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this API to get the list of shipping carriers and request parameters needed before calling v2.returns.upload_shipping_proof. Only for TW and BR returns with is_seller_arrange = true.

error_list.name: returns.missing_reverse_logistics_carrier_list
error_list.description: No reverse logistics carrier list available

error_list.name: returns.missing_return_sn
error_list.description: Return SN is a required parameter

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The serial number of return.

","name":"return_sn","sample":"2206150VT13E3MQ","type":"string","required":"True","key":"QNRpScf"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"zHnXjiM"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xpPTaTE"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"d52ca43b277a4f9292fb8be658bfd33d","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"BmYhPeD"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"sMwmjZk","children":[{"description":"

To indicate whether uploading shipping proof is mandatory for seller to confirm \"Arrange Pickup\" when is_seller_arrange = true.

","name":"is_shipping_proof_mandatory","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"pzeZTNH"},{"description":"

To indicate whether seller has already uploaded shipping proof for this return.

","name":"has_uploaded_seller_arrange_proof","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"hkJSeZe"},{"description":"

To display list of request parameters needed to upload shipping proof.

","name":"shipping_proof_template","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"ntEaNMs","children":[{"description":"

To indicate whether it is mandatory to provide tracking number when uploading shipping proof.

","name":"is_tracking_number_required","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"wThTpfx"},{"description":"

To indicate whether it is mandatory to provide shipping image file(s) when uploading shipping proof.

","name":"is_shipping_image_file_mandatory","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"DzPdwZn"}]},{"description":"

The list of logistics carriers available for sellers to choose.

","name":"reverse_logistics_carrier_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"QSDGmZ","children":[{"description":"

To indicate the id of the non-integrated reverse logistics channel used by seller.

","name":"reverse_logistics_carrier_id","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"hPNdRYa"},{"description":"

To indicate the selected carrier name from the list of carrier names provided.

","name":"reverse_logistics_carrier_name","sample":"test_reverse_logistics_carrier_name","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xFCJZNn"}]}]}]}
